law.text: This chapter is intended to supplement KRS 177.390 to 177.570 by providing an additional and alternative method for the provision and financing of turnpikes and appurtenant facilities to the end that such projects may be undertaken in such manner as may best be calculated to expedite relief from hazardous and congested traffic conditions on the highways in the Commonwealth and to provide acceptable avenues of commerce and intercommunication by vehicular traffic among the several sections of the Commonwealth.
law.history: Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 173, sec. 1, effective March 25, 1960.
